scripts.deploy: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const url = execSync('git config --get remote.origin.url').toString().trim(); const match = url.match(/[:/]([^/]+\/[^/]+)\.git$/); if(!match) throw new Error('Repo not found'); process.env.GITHUB_ACTIONS='true'; process.env.GITHUB_REPOSITORY=match[1]; require('child_process').execSync('next build && gh-pages -d out -b gh-pages --dotfiles', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
